biocontainers.name: stoatydive
biocontainers.summary: Stoatydive is a tool to evaluate and classify predicted peak profiles to assess the binding specificity of a protein to its targets.

biotools.summary:
Evaluation and Classification of Peak Profiles for Sequencing Data.

StoatyDive is a tool to evaluate and classify predicted peak profiles to assess the binding specificity of a protein to its targets. It can be used for sequencing data such as CLIP-seq or ChIP-Seq, or any other type of peak profile data.

StoatyDive is a tool to evaluate and classify predicted peak profiles to assess the binding specificity of a protein to its targets
